title: Game crashes after loading
body: For some reason every time I try to load into a game my computer completely freezes. First time I was able to buy items and as soon as I clicked to move it froze up on me. Second time it was frozen the second that I loaded into the game. I searched on google and didnt find any discussion about this so I thought I'd bring it up here. I uninstalled the game between attempts and am working on checking for updates and what not but I don't think it would have let me buy the first time if it was a driver issue right? Anyone have any ideas what it could be?

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  There's been an issue where some players are freezing because the xbox game bar isn't interacting properly with League.  I suggest disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this resolved.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
Took me a while to get around to it but this fixed my problem! Thanks man!
